Kill Bill: Vol. 1

Rank: 795


After waking from a four-year coma- a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.


Director: Quentin Tarantino

Writer: Quentin Tarantino, Uma Thurman

Stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah

Tags: Kung Fu, Martial Arts, One,Person Army Action, Action, Crime, Thriller
